name: Necrotech Bonecage Constrictor
description: This Huge undead creature combines technology and necromancy, standing as a fearsome presence on the battlefield.
memorable: Its ability to restrain foes within its body while they are stabilized at 0 hit points makes it uniquely horrifying.
goals: To restrain and incapacitate enemies on the battlefield.
relations: Related to other undead creatures, often found with necromantic spellcasters.
environment: Often encountered in places tainted by death or arcane experimentation.
strengths: High hit points and a powerful restraining ability provide it with excellent durability and battlefield control.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to bludgeoning and thunder damage, which can exploit its durability.
attacks: It can make two Bite attacks dealing piercing and necrotic damage, and one Encage attack that restrains targets.
most_powerful_ability: Necrotic Prison allows restrained creatures to stabilize at 0 hp, creating a unique situation in combat.
senses: Possesses tremorsense up to 30 feet, allowing it to detect movement even in darkness.
skills: Has proficiency in Strength saving throws, boosting its resistance against physical challenges.
additional_information: Immune to poisoned condition and being knocked prone.
Can restrain up to 6 Medium or smaller creatures simultaneously.
Creatures caged take additional necrotic damage each turn.
Requires Dexterity saving throw for Entangle action to restrain foes.
Vulnerabilities can be exploited to shift the tide of battle.
test_queries: huge monster that does bludgeoning damage
menacing constrictor creature with high hp
